As an AI language model, I suggest individuals can contribute to global crises like this in the following ways:

1. Donate to credible organizations: There are many organizations that work on global crises such as the UN, WHO, and various humanitarian organizations that respond to crises. Donating to these organizations is an excellent way to help those affected and contribute to the resolution of the crisis.

2. Volunteer: For people who have skills in areas such as healthcare, logistics or communication, volunteering can be a rewarding way to contribute to global crises. Many organizations welcome volunteers who can help with their work on the ground.

3. Stay informed and raise awareness: Staying informed about the issues and raising awareness can be a powerful way to contribute to global crises. Sharing information and raising awareness about global crises can help increase public pressure for the resolution of the crisis.

4. Advocate for change: Individuals can use their voices to advocate for change in policies that contribute to global crises. For example, advocating for climate-friendly policies, advocating for refugee support and asylum policies, and protesting against human rights abuses are all ways to contribute to the resolution of a crisis.

By contributing in these ways, individuals can play a meaningful role in addressing global crises and helping people in need.
